text: This is a list of the top 50 National Football League (NFL) players by most career regular season passing touchdowns. Tom Brady holds the record for the most passing touchdowns with 649. He also has the most playoff touchdown passes with 88. ==Regular season career passing touchdowns leaders== Legend ^ Inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame * Denotes player who is still active Through season. passing touchdowns leaders== Sixteen players are recognized as having held outright or tied the record as the NFL's career passing touchdowns leader. The longest record holder was Fran Tarkenton who held the record for 20 years from 1975 to 1994.
